00056 if(!(COND)) { \
00057     std::ostringstream lStream; \
00058     lStream << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << "\n" << MESSAGE; \
00059     ::MessageBox(NULL, lStream.str().c_str(), "PACC assert error!", MB_ICONERROR | MB_OK); \
00060     exit(-1); \
00061 }
00062 #else
00064 #define PACC_AssertM(COND,MESSAGE) \
